comments:
Eclipse version > M5

Steps To Reproduce:

(1) Create a new plug-in project based off of the Hello World template
(2) Dirty the ID field on the Overview page (i.e. change the value without
    saving the editor)
(3) Switch to Extension Points page
(4) Click the "Add..." button
(5) Type anything in any field on the new extension point wizard page
    -> NPE on every key stroke

java.lang.NullPointerException
at org.eclipse.pde.internal.ui.wizards.extension.BaseExtensionPointMainPage.validateExtensionPointID(BaseExtensionPointMainPage.java:419)
at org.eclipse.pde.internal.ui.wizards.extension.NewExtensionPointMainPage.validateFieldContents(NewExtensionPointMainPage.java:97)
at org.eclipse.pde.internal.ui.wizards.extension.BaseExtensionPointMainPage.validatePage(BaseExtensionPointMainPage.java:399)
at org.eclipse.pde.internal.ui.wizards.extension.BaseExtensionPointMainPage.access$0(BaseExtensionPointMainPage.java:396)
at org.eclipse.pde.internal.ui.wizards.extension.BaseExtensionPointMainPage$7.modifyText(BaseExtensionPointMainPage.java:189)
at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.TypedListener.handleEvent(TypedListener.java:166)
at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.EventTable.sendEvent(EventTable.java:66)

Fixed.  Patch released to HEAD.

Target:  3.3 M6
